document_data.name: Lhesperan
document_data.mainbody: The '''Lhesperan''' was a refined breed of [[horse|light horse]] that originated from the [[Shaar]]an town of [[Lhesper]], but since spread across the greater country and into the [[Bandit Wastes]].
document_data.Description: These horses were medium-brown in color, with lighter-hued manes and tails. They were quite relaxed in their demeanor and elegant in their action.
document_data.History: While the Lhesperans were first bred in their namesake city, they were since killed off in the town by [[yuan-ti]]. However, they were still plentiful in the surrounding areas.
